validityText:

Additionally, the input specification allows for the inclusion of company names (Apple), people's names (Tim Cook), and specific topics (electronic advancements), all of which are present in the sentence. There are no restrictions on the length of the text, meaning this short text is acceptable. Lastly, the comprehensibility requirement is satisfied because the input is in English, a language commonly understood, allowing for accurate entity extraction.
